title: Politics is Coming Between My Father and Me
description:
Terry says her father constantly confronts her with political talk despite asking him repeatedly not to. - Dr. Laura: "Turn around and leave each time dad does what you specifically ask him not to."

What topic do you try to avoid discussing with family? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
